TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INestedSite implements class System.ComponentModel.ISite, class System.IServiceProvider

Docs.summary: Provides the ability to retrieve the full nested name of a component.
Gets the full name of the component in this site.
Docs.value: The full name of the component in this site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The FullName property returns the full name of the component in this site in the format of [*owner*].[*component*]*.* If this component's site has a null name, the property also returns `null`.

Docs.returns: The full name of the component in this site.
